website_summaries.verdict: Despite some quality issues, it's a good choice if you need a reasonably-priced, self-inking date stamp.
pros: Features a self-contained ink pad that can be "re-inked," adding to this stamp's value
Produces crisp numbers in bold red ink that are easy to read
cons: Date adjustment wheels can be hard to turn, and you get ink on your fingers when you attempt to change them

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of this stamp
customer_reviews.text: I use date stamps all the time in my teaching to mark the date work is received from a student. I need something that stands up to lots of use! I like the size of this stamp. I was disappointed in the quality of the print. The "new" device did not stamp the complete date clearly. Letters in the month are unclear. Numbers were clearer. Additionally, the little wheels the user has to turn to change the date are so small that I find it impossible to change the date--something I do daily--without getting ink on my fingers. Just a heads up!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Great stamp, but changing date is messy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Samp font is really nice. Easy to read. Self inking works well. Replaceable ink pad is nice because they will dry out over time. Cons: Really hard to change date without getting ink all over your fingers due to tiny wheels. Conclusion: Great stamp for the price, but I would probably look for something a little easier to change next time.
customer_reviews.author: Silicon Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, but does the job. Good for small fingers, not large.
customer_reviews.text: This date stamper gets the job done. It’s tiny. I expected something larger like the one I was replacing. It came with no instructions, which was irritating. To set the date, you have to compress the stamper and rotate the tiny nubs to the correct date, in reverse/upside down. It comes with a small ink tray that works fine once inserted properly. See photos.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Name

customer_reviews.title: For the price it is really nice.
customer_reviews.text: The only downside to this stamp is you have to do some figuring to make sure your date is correct on it. However it does stamp clear and you can get a refill on the ink it seems. For the price it is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How big is the print and the machine itself -- not clear in photo
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace a date stamper with a new one because the old one ran out of years. the new one looked a lot like the old one, but it turned out to be much smaller and the printing was smaller as well. Also, no indication appeared with the stamper to re-order the red ink pad when the one supplied ran dry.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Greenstadt

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and is small on my desk
customer_reviews.text: I use this to date my notes from y on line training in social media marketing. My mentor suggested I date every piece of paper I touch to be sure I touch it only once. It works for me. The unit is small and works great. I make sure the label is facing me so the date is the right side up. It goes from 2013 to 2024. I had the old model but it ended in 2012 so I needed to get a new one. Highly recommended. sturdy well build inexpensive compared to office stores locally delivered fast
customer_reviews.author: Clay Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Needed a date stamp and found this simple straight-forward date stamp. Price was affordable. It is made with plastic, so it's perfectly fine for occasional home use. Maybe not suited for frequent heavy-handed commercial use though. Date adjustments are simple with little spins of the knurled wheels. Haven't had problems with changing the dates.
customer_reviews.author: Alfa Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Time saver!!
customer_reviews.text: This product saves me a LOT of time during my work day. It stamps very clearly. The ink dries fast on any papers I have stamped thus far. It saves time as I stamp a lot of paperwork throughout my day! Fast service!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I'll be using this for regulatory forms. It is the perfect size to fit into the form boxes and prints very clearly. Will update my review after I've used it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Kuchenbecker

customer_reviews.title: YEAR DATE INCLUDES 2017 AND FUTURE YEAR DATES
customer_reviews.text: I've had several of these in past years. However, none of those I have included the year date of 2017 and several years going forward. This one does have such a feature. Becuase of my past experience with this brand, I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: EeeVee

customer_reviews.title: Self Inking stamp
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit small. I didn't realize it was so tiny. It also put red in all over my hands each time I use it. It's very messy. Next time I would spend more money for a better quality stamp. Also, it's very hard to figure out putting the correct date in. Again, I just chose the wrong type of product because I was trying to save money. However, it did arrive quickly and in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Joswen E.

customer_reviews.title: WONT ACCEPT RETURN. I WANT MY MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Not what I wanted the printing is too small and I CANT RETURN IT what’s horrible product. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Bonesteel

customer_reviews.title: Stamp away!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our homeschooling documentation needs!! This stamp is small yet sturdy. It stamps a clear red date that is easily changeable. We use it on a daily basis and it has held up nicely so far. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Quick Stamp
customer_reviews.text: Prints real clear and precise. I like to date stamp any correspondence I receive in the mail that I am going to retain. If I am filling out forms where a date is asked for, I like using the stamp for its clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: It's a date stamp.
customer_reviews.text: Yep. Prints red, just like the photo. Letters and number look like the photo. The stamper is small, the letters & numbers are small. I use them on slick paper, and it takes a few minutes to dry, but that was expected. Didn't take hours like other stamps. do.
customer_reviews.author: Lv2Read

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, but not easily.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, not the easiest to figure out, but it was pretty inexpensive, so I guess I sacrifice convenience for that. It's kind of time-consuming to figure out how to turn the dials to get the date you want to print. It would be slit nicer if that were a lot easier, but I wasn't in the market for something more expensive than what I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy M

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need it for! The only downside ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need it for! The only downside is that the little knob to rotate the numbers runs so close to the numbers that I end up getting red ink all over my fingers when trying to change the date. If you have long nails it wouldn't be an issue, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Carolynn Tulluck

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. The ink is red and pretty bright. So, I put some black ink in the removable pad and now it is much darker. You could just buy the black ink one. This is a few dollars so not a lot to say. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Fun Stamp, Difficult (for me) to set date
customer_reviews.text: We got this to use for a Brownie (Girl Scout) passport project. The girls had great fun stamping their passports...and everything else. It took me awhile to figure out the date, though...it's backwards...so you can't really see what date you are setting. Still, lots of fun once you figure that out. (For me, it was via trial and error.)
customer_reviews.author: Mayflower Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice stamp
customer_reviews.text: Been printing for a few months now and still inking great
customer_reviews.author: BobbyD

customer_reviews.title: Rubber Date Stamp
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses this to indicate when mail comes in, marks his calendar to indicate when something is accomplished, and any other time he wants to date anything. He says this is the best Date Stamp he has ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne E. Ice

customer_reviews.title: Very nice nad useful.
customer_reviews.text: Got this almost three years ago. I have re-inked it a few times, but other than that, does just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Works
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size stamp for small application areas. The wheel devices that roll the months and numbers is made from plastic. In the "olden" days these were made of metal. Because of the plastic design, the working parts of the stamp are flimsy. It does its job though, but I think it may break soon.
customer_reviews.author: BD.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the product I save a lot of money in time by older it on Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive choice.
customer_reviews.text: While it's just made of plastic, it does what it needs to do. Clear image. Not expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've had this stamp for 5 months and am very disappointed. The wheels to change the date are hard to get to and it hurts my fingers. The dates also smudge the ink and you can't tell what the date is.
customer_reviews.author: Pam M.

customer_reviews.title: It came super quick. The one I received didn't come with ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong item, got my refund. It came super quick. The one I received didn't come with ink, it was a little tiny mini. It looked nice, but the size was so super small. Pay attention to the sizes
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Love it and just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love it and just what I needed. Lettering a little smaller than what I wanted but it serves it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Intense

customer_reviews.title: It works as described. Should have read more of ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. Should have read more of the details. The numbers/letters are a lot smaller than I anticipated. They also do not stay put on vinyl stickers (like sharpie).
customer_reviews.author: Denver area

customer_reviews.title: I should've looked closely at the size but it's so small it looks like a
customer_reviews.text: Tiny! I should've looked closely at the size but it's so small it looks like a toy
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lowry

customer_reviews.title: I love this stamp
customer_reviews.text: I love this stamp!! It is very clear and not too big, so easy to store. And I like the grip feeling, too. I definitely want to recommend to my friends. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Ships quickly. Even came set to the date that I received it. Year range started with the current year and goes ahead from there. That is a nice plus that I have not always enjoyed with these kind of stamps.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Nice little stamp
customer_reviews.text: Nice little stamp. Plan to use it to make a ten-year journal. I was hoping the print would be a little bigger however. But I am still very pleased. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ink gets on your hands and very difficult to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Major Stith

customer_reviews.title: Pain to change date
customer_reviews.text: Pain to change the date and your fingers get all red.
customer_reviews.author: DenaliBear

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: received promptly and seller was good to deal with. Item works great. thanks
customer_reviews.author: BratChild

customer_reviews.title: Ink pad was dry
customer_reviews.text: I revived this last week and just opened it today to use in my classroom. I was very disappointed to find the ink was dry in the in pad. When I go to stamp it shows up very light. I don't feel if the stamp is new in should have to refill it with ink. Was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stamp, plenty of symbols on top of the obvious months/numbers, and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to adjust date (helps if you can read backwards...). Prints firmly and clearly, no skips. I bought this to print date in a box on order forms and find that it is easy to line up within the box.
customer_reviews.author: dawg78

customer_reviews.title: Uneven print
customer_reviews.text: Very small, like a miniature stamp. Worked OK a couple weeks. Now the date stamp is uneven, with one number very faint. Spend a couple bucks more and get a real date stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G.

customer_reviews.title: it does the job
customer_reviews.text: For what I use it for it works but starting out I had more red ink on my fingers from trying to get the date set. If you have longer finger nails you would probably be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Germanlost

customer_reviews.title: Smooth mechanism
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than I thought it would be, but it works great! I use this date stamp many times each day, and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Mama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for recording the date anywhere and everywhere you need ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for recording the date anywhere and everywhere you need it for 10 years! Great deal and fast shipment made it a no brainer buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sahana

customer_reviews.title: Works well for what I need it for
customer_reviews.text: Works well...but sometimes difficult to change date. Wheels are small and hard to turn sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Rehaag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the stamp! It is what I wanted to stamp the date on papers.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Michael

customer_reviews.title: Date stamp
customer_reviews.text: Better off writing the date in. I guess it would be good if frequent date stamping is needed.
customer_reviews.author: nike

customer_reviews.title: It's great! Have been using it a few months now ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this several times a day at work! It's great! Have been using it a few months now and is still like new. Easy to refill!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to change date without getting ink on your fingers
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: Stamp works fine and like that it is small
customer_reviews.text: The one I received had a "Received" on the stamp which I removed since I am using for payment dates. Stamp works fine and like that it is small.
customer_reviews.author: pking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and can be used for years to come. I love the red ink.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Great little stamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my student assistant to date stamp my copies after she sends my originals down to the fiscal office and have used it myself a few times on days she's not working. It's a great little stamp and I'm glad I bought the red ink as it really helps it stand out on the page. The slider is a bit small, so you have to be careful or you'll end up with red ink on your fingers, but it slides easily. I've had stampers that are really tough to turn, so it's nice to have one that turns easily.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Watanabe

customer_reviews.title: Very small.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the size when it was delivered. I ended up liking it but wished the description told how small it was.
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: Good but small dater
customer_reviews.text: Good, but small stamper. It stamps well and the red ink is great, but compared to our last dater, it feels miniature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great. Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small date stamp to mark pages in small memo books I carry. This works great. The size is perfect and so far out of the box it operates without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: JHawkins

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple little stamper that does it's job well. I have not had any catastrophic ink incidents, bleeding, or drying out. Would recommend it to anyone looking for a plain, reliable stamper.
customer_reviews.author: Shami Aiwase

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend the product
customer_reviews.text: The ink is dried out and its too small. Would not recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: E_K

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, wish it had a cap
customer_reviews.text: The stamp is easy to use, easy to set, and prints clearly. I wish it had a little cap so that it could be stored without its box. I've only had it for a few months, but so far the ink pad is still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: parkinsummer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use this to stamp dates on student homework. It is just the right size and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Waynemia

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a Girl Scout project and it's doing the job! We are putting together passports that go over different meetings and it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great little stamper!
customer_reviews.text: Great little stamper... Nothing fancy, but exactly what I was looking for at a great price. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: date stamp
customer_reviews.text: love this stamp. I use this on my avon books makes it much easier to get my books out on time.
customer_reviews.author: amandanicole

customer_reviews.title: It's okay!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put the ink in but every time you turn the dials for the dates, you do get some red ink on your fingers. But other than that, it was a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful! Easy to use! Bright red ink and works smoothly when pressing down.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: Great stamp, I use it in high school and after several tens of thousands of stamps from passing it through my classes, I finally need to refill the ink pad.
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: It stamps a small date, which is perfect for what I wanted. I use it in my classroom and it works very well. Easy to change the date daily.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing! The print is perfect for what I need it for. Ink is red and nice. Best rubber date stamp!
customer_reviews.author: RKujat

customer_reviews.title: Compact and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to stamp incoming mail. Have been using it for quite a few months and it's still working well and as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Boston_Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bold ink- would like a more solid piece though.
customer_reviews.author: Connie from Sunny S. Florida

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and at a great price! Would recommend to anyone looking for a self inking stamp!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: red ink date stamp.
customer_reviews.text: Help organize your paperwork with a easy to read visible date stamp.
customer_reviews.author: M. ROSENSTEEL

customer_reviews.title: great stamper
customer_reviews.text: This gets everything accomplished needed, however adjusting the date takes some time and is fairly hard. works great though !
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little stamper. Just what I needed. Light weight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Nifty!
customer_reviews.text: I love it & I can even flip the inkpad to keep it from drying out !
customer_reviews.author: Christin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for prompt shipping. It works as was expected. I need to figure out an easy way to get the numbers, etc to line up without stamping it so much. I wish i could fine a stamper with the word "send" and date on it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Berggren

customer_reviews.title: Functional and durable
customer_reviews.text: Has been in use in a high school class room for one semester during which it has been dropped several time, has date stamped probably a hundred homework assignments a day. Came completely apart once when it fell about a meter from a shelf, but it reassembled easily with no apparent damage.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Works good. Quick
customer_reviews.text: The small size is date is a plus to fit the date anywhere. Works good. Quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for stamping students' homework
customer_reviews.text: Great for stamping students' homework. The stamp and ink are always clear. I removed the 'PAID' stamp to only stamp the date.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Great Product At A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I use a red one to stamp expiration dates on certificates. Sharp print and it also stamps straight. Also, it comes with like 10 years of future dates.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Great stamp. Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Great stamp. Works very well. Previously had a different brand and the numbers would roll. This one stays in place. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Stamps are clear and don't smudge easily
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin. Good quality. Stamps are clear and don't smudge easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: date stamp works great
customer_reviews.text: I like my date stamp. It has will last me till 2026 so I'm very pleased with my date stamp that I just order and came in quicker than I was expecting
customer_reviews.author: Erendira Perez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stamp is great, I just wish it was a little bigger. I would definitely recommend this stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McGlauflin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I had never used a dater before, so wasn't sure I would like it. I bought it to stamp the date on assignments that my college students turn in. It helps me keep up with on time and late work. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea H

customer_reviews.title: What a great time saver.
customer_reviews.text: I have saved a lot of time with this date stamper. It works well and it only gets a little messy when I have to change the dates on it. But that is to be expected with this type stamper. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenhawk

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: a good inexpensive stamp. a little small, and maybe more fragile than others. but it is great for the money.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work. I know you're thinking "it's a stamp ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work. I know you're thinking "it's a stamp, what can't work". When depressed all the way down, the stamp didn't reach the paper. Total junk! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: SarahG

customer_reviews.title: It works and it's cheap...what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little date stamp for home use. It looks a bit flimsy so I would not recommend it for heavy duty office use but it's perfect for the home.

customer_reviews.title: Really Cheapie
customer_reviews.text: If you just want a cheapie self inking date stamper, this is ok. There is a better one but it's $20

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a few days as always with amazon. It is good quality and works perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size....seems durable enough for my needs (about 100 stamps per month). The item description did not have the actual size...so for those who would like to know: 2 3/4" tall, 1" x 1 3/4" for the base (hope that helps).

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly functional
customer_reviews.text: This does what I needed it for very nicely. I recommend it. It works well and is easy to update.

customer_reviews.title: Must Have in PK Classroom
customer_reviews.text: I use this stamp at work to stamp 4 yr old students' work. It helps me keep track of the dates and check on their progress. Reasonable price and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Life is Great!

customer_reviews.title: Stamporiffic
customer_reviews.text: This stamp works wonders. It has a plethora of dates, self-inking capability, affordability, and total portability. I have used this stamp quite often and it's exactly what I need.

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: pure junk, I would return it, but it's not worth the hassle to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brossart

customer_reviews.title: too difficult to figure out the date that will stamp ...
customer_reviews.text: too difficult to figure out the date that will stamp. everything is done in reverse and the stamp flips to leave the mark. there is no label to read the date that you will stamp, you must use trial and error.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: If you can't get a date try this
customer_reviews.text: It will never say no or have to wash its hair because it's always waiting to give your a great date.

customer_reviews.title: guessing game
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find the correct date does not make any sense--you have to guess.

customer_reviews.title: too tiny

customer_reviews.title: It's not fun. I would not buy this item
customer_reviews.text: It was what they said it was. It arrived on time. What else could I want. Tucson AZ USA However the month, dates, and year stamp do not stay lined up. You have to continually realigine them betweem every for stamps. It's not fun. I would not buy this item again
customer_reviews.author: USMC 1959-1963

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I finally found exactly what I was looking for. I'm 100% completely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julio V.

product_meta.title: Shiny Self-Inking Rubber Date Stamp - S-300 - RED Ink (42510-R)
product_meta.description:
Self Inking Rubber Date Stamps are an efficient and accurate way to document the date transactions occur.

Made of durable plasitic, this Mini Date Stamp is versatile, lightweight and is an economical option for occassional dating needs. This date stamp is also re-inkable for the useful life of the dater, making this an exceptional value. The small print on this dater makes it the dater of choice when stamping with limited space.

This date stamp is an exceptional bargain as it includes 10 years of dates.
feature_bullets: Line Dater - Prints the date only
Thousands of impressions before re-inking is necessary

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars201 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
